pullrequest.title: Fix mouse picking with transparent visuals

content.raw:
I actually tried doing this for another PR and noticed that `g_main_win` is not in the global scope.

One of the things we use `get_entity_id` for is differentiating between simulation and edit mode. But checking for `VisualType` might still not let us differentiate between main window models and nested models in the model editor, right?
content.html:
I actually tried doing this for another PR and noticed that g_main_win is not in the global scope.

One of the things we use get_entity_id for is differentiating between simulation and edit mode. But checking for VisualType might still not let us differentiate between main window models and nested models in the model editor, right?
